overview:
A heart surgeon by profession, and a veteran of sorts in the global kids and family entertainment industry. Nandish Domlur has spent close to ten years in the global digital content services business.

Nandish was one of the first to see the enormous potential in the digital content industry, and founded Paprikaas â€“ a boutique 3D Animation and Video Games Services Company, with a motley crew of passionate & creative artists. Nandish recently successfully exited Paprika through a trade sale to Dreamworks.

Nandish’s current venture and passion is Protein Entertainment - it’s a trans-media company engaged in producing original and branded content across diverse platforms like feature films, TV shows, video games, mobile games, comics & graphic novels, interactive & theme park rides for the global market.
